# cds-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description       | Type                                                                                                                            | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `class`     | `class`     | CSS Classes       | `string`                                                                                                                        | `''`        |
| `color`     | `color`     | Tooltip color     | `"black" \| "danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "link" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "white"` | `undefined` |
| `offset`    | `offset`    | Tooltip offset    | `number`                                                                                                                        | `8`         |
| `placement` | `placement` | Tooltip placement | `"auto" \| "bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"`                                                                              | `'auto'`    |
| `trigger`   | `trigger`   | Tooltip trigger   | `"click" \| "hover"`                                                                                                            | `'hover'`   |
